body:
d always has a bandaid ready when i cut myself, after decades of life where i made do with nothing or scotch taping a paper towel over a wound 

miso came and fell asleep in my lap while i was sitting in the low chair in the living room doing support tickets, the longest she's ever sat with me like that

a pull request i'd been working on for a while was approved with very minimal changes and the engineer provided some helpful and encouraging notes 

our team's weekly meeting got moved from tuesday to wednesday, which, even though i would have preferred if it got moved to thursday or friday, is still an improvement

miso likes the new toy we got her at the grocery store, which is a ball of tightly knotted rope that she is enjoying destroying

oat milk was on sale at the grocery store so we got some and it has been interesting to have in my morning oatmeal, i don't know if i _like_ it or not but i cannot deny it makes oatmeal incredibly oaty

there are new episodes of _terrace house_ for us to watch, and also _undone_ and _kuwtk_ and _peaky blinders_ and soon _the good place_.

long deep seated forward bends

the oxford comma ([https://twitter.com/davejorgenson/status/1176243940728684547?s=21](https://twitter.com/davejorgenson/status/1176243940728684547?s=21))

singing with d

miso came and fell asleep in my lap while i was sitting in the low chair in the living room doing support tickets, the longest she's ever sat with me like that

a pull request i'd been working on for a while was approved with very minimal changes and the engineer provided some helpful and encouraging notes 

our team's weekly meeting got moved from tuesday to wednesday, which, even though i would have preferred if it got moved to thursday or friday, is still an improvement

miso likes the new toy we got her at the grocery store, which is a ball of tightly knotted rope that she is enjoying destroying

oat milk was on sale at the grocery store so we got some and it has been interesting to have in my morning oatmeal, i don't know if i _like_ it or not but i cannot deny it makes oatmeal incredibly oaty

there are new episodes of _terrace house_ for us to watch, and also _undone_ and _kuwtk_ and _peaky blinders_ and soon _the good place_.

singing with d
